statements: SELECT location, date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_patterns;
SELECT temperature, location, precipitation, date, humidity FROM weather_patterns ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_patterns WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, humidity, date FROM weather_patterns WHERE precipitation < 5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_patterns WHERE humidity > 80 ORDER BY temperature DESC, location ASC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_patterns WHERE temperature > 25.0 ORDER BY location ASC, date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, humidity FROM weather_patterns WHERE precipitation < 0.5 ORDER BY humidity DESC, location DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM weather_patterns WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC, location ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT location, date, precipitation FROM weather_patterns WHERE temperature > 30.0 AND humidity > 70.0 ORDER BY precipitation DESC, date ASC LIMIT 15
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM weather_patterns GROUP BY location HAVING avg_temp > 20.0 AND max_humidity < 80.0 ORDER BY avg_temp DESC
SELECT id, location, date, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_patterns WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM climate_trends WHERE year = 2021
SELECT location, average_temperature FROM climate_trends WHERE average_temperature >= 20 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM weather_patterns
SELECT * FROM weather_patterns WHERE precipitation < 10 ORDER BY date
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM weather_patterns WHERE date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, date, precipitation FROM weather_patterns WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, location, year, average_temperature, annual_precipitation FROM climate_trends WHERE annual_precipitation BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY average_temperature DESC;
SELECT location, year, average_temperature, annual_precipitation FROM climate_trends WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT id, location, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_patterns WHERE temperature < 0.0 OR precipitation > 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC, precipitation ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_patterns;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_patterns WHERE precipitation > 0.5;
SELECT id, date, precipitation FROM weather_patterns WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, date FROM weather_patterns WHERE temperature < 15 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM climate_trends WHERE region='Asia';
SELECT * FROM weather_patterns ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM weather_patterns WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 10 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT region, trend FROM climate_trends WHERE region LIKE 'A%' AND trend IN ('Rising', 'Stable') ORDER BY region, trend;
SELECT id, scenario, prediction FROM future_scenarios WHERE scenario = 'Catastrophic' OR scenario = 'Optimistic' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_patterns JOIN climate_trends ON weather_patterns.id = climate_trends.id WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY temperature DESC, region ASC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT region_name, latitude, longitude FROM WeatherRegions ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT model_name, description FROM ClimateModels WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, predicted_temperature, predicted_humidity FROM WeatherPredictions WHERE region_id = 1 AND model_id = 3 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25.0 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 0.5 AND precipitation > 0.2 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM WeatherData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT region_name, predicted_temperature FROM WeatherPredictions JOIN WeatherRegions ON WeatherPredictions.region_id = WeatherRegions.region_id WHERE model_id = 3 ORDER BY predicted_temperature DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT model_name, COUNT(region_id) AS num_regions FROM ClimateModels JOIN WeatherPredictions ON ClimateModels.model_id = WeatherPredictions.model_id GROUP BY model_name HAVING num_regions > 5 ORDER BY num_regions DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 0.5;
SELECT location, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM climate_patterns WHERE pattern_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT forecast_date, location, forecast_temperature, forecast_humidity FROM weather_forecasts ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM climate_trends WHERE trend_intensity >= 0.5 ORDER BY trend_end_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_forecasts GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_temp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM future_scenarios WHERE predicted_temperature < 20 AND predicted_humidity < 60 ORDER BY scenario_date ASC LIMIT 5;
